parameters.query: =SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE account_id = '{{$json["extra"]["account"]}}' AND ( identifier = '{{$json["chat"]["id"]}}' OR phone_number = '{{$json["chat"]["phone"]}}' )

=SELECT 
 display_id, 
 status
FROM conversations 
WHERE 
	account_id = '{{ $json.account }}' 
	AND inbox_id = '{{ $json.inbox }}'
	AND contact_id = '{{ $json.contactid }}'
ORDER BY display_id DESC
LIMIT 1
